data.question: What is the primary method used to prepare porous solids with tunable pore sizes?
data.answer: The use of organic multidentate ligands to organize inorganic species.

data.question: What is the goal of using multifunctional ligands in the synthesis of covalent superlattices?
data.answer: To create porous materials with tunable pore sizes in both micro- and meso- regimes.

data.question: Is the [Cd8(SPh)12]4+ cluster a new addition to the family of single-sized cadmium chalcogenide clusters?
What is the name of the three-dimensional photoluminescent superlattice reported in the study?
What is the role of the tetradentate dye molecules in the structure of UCR-9?
Does UCR-9 undergo an abrupt weight loss at about 300 °C according to thermogravimetric analysis?
What structural feature is a novel addition to UCR-9?
Is the structure of the [Cd8(SPh)12]4+ cluster similar to the double four-ring unit in zeolites?
How is the tetradentate dye molecule in UCR-9 synthesized?
data.answer: By oxidative coupling of two 4,4‘-trimethylenedipyridine molecules.

data.question: What is the crystal volume occupied by disordered extraframework species in UCR-9?
Does UCR-9's emission at 580 nm disappear upon dissolving in dilute nitric acid?
What is the likely cause of the emission peak at 580 nm in UCR-9?
Can the emission at 580 nm in UCR-9 be excited by a wide spectral range down to at least 350 nm?
What is the effect of combining dye molecules and inorganic clusters in UCR-9?
data.answer: It enhances luminescent properties of the inorganic cluster.

data.question: Is the self-assembly of inorganic and organic components in UCR-9 a first step toward the organization of chalcogenide cluster units?
What is the emission peak of UCR-9 when excited at 370 nm?
data.answer: 580 nm and a doublet at 415 and 440 nm.

data.question: Does the weak emission of UCR-9 at 360 nm originate from the framework?
What is the significance of the broad absorption range in UCR-9 for photovoltaic applications?
data.answer: It allows for a broad absorption of the solar spectrum.

data.question: What is the composition of the light yellow precursor used in the synthesis of UCR-9?
Is the emission from dye molecules observable even after UCR-9 is dissolved in nitric acid?
